name: Museum Thief
description:
In this game, your goal is to retrieve your family heirloom, the duck gem,  from the last floor of the museum. To do so, you'll need to steal several masterpieces from the museum in order to get money to buy items that will help you explore the museum.

Be careful, since there are guards in each floor keeping an eye on the masterpieces, if you get caught while stealing, you'll lose all your carrying masterpieces and start again from the Studio room.

Thanks a lot for playing!
